You have mastered the art of wielding two weapons simultaneously. You gain the following benefits:

  • You have +1 to AC while wielding a different melee weapon in each hand.

  • You can use the bonus action attack granted by two-weapon fighting even if the weapons you are wielding arenâ€™t light. Similarly, you are no longer restricted to the use of light weapons if you have the Quick Strike Martial Action.

  • You can now draw or stow two one-handed weapons in the same time it would normally take you to draw or stow a single weapon.
